* Email: carl@system76.com
* Make: Asus
* Model: Z62F
* Dual Core Centrino based on the Intel Napa Platform

=== Current Issues ===
'''__Flight 5__'''

'''No Sound'''

Bug #32637 - Intel High Definition Audio - Azalia (ADI) AD1986A Chipset

'''Incorrect Video Resolution'''

---update--- A 915resolution update fixes this bug.  Some <nowiki>[[http://system76.com/knowledge/index.php/Resolution_1280x800_with_Intel_945GM|tweeking]]</nowiki> is necessary

Bug #39154 - Intel 945GM graphics (part of Intel's Napa platform).  Installer places the correct resolution of 1280x800 in xorg.conf; however, the actual resolution achived is 1024x768.

'''Wireless'''

---update2--- Wireless is working out of the box!

---update--- Support is expected in Dapper.  Support is in the kernel; however, a typo is causing trouble.  Fix expected.

Bug #35215 - Intel Pro Wireless 3945ABG (ipw3945 - part of Intel's Napa platform).  Wireless card is not recognized.
